DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether prostacyclin effective prevention cerebral vasospasm patient subarachnoidal hemorrhage ( SAH ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Prostacyclin Infusion Cerebral Vessels Metabolism Patients With Subarachnoid Haemorrhage
DOC.criteria: SAH verify CT Aneurysm identify treat Fisher grade 3 + 4 WFNS grade 14 ( World Federation Neurosurgical Societies ) Pregnancy/lactation Heard failure Kidney failure Liver failure Hemorrhagic diathesis
